scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=api && mkdir -p .vercel_build_output api && cp -r public .vercel_build_output/ && cp -r apps/api/api/* api/
scripts.figma:sync: cd tools/figma && npm install && npm run sync
scripts.figma:tokens: cd tools/figma && npm install && npm run extract-tokens
scripts.figma:assets: cd tools/figma && npm install && npm run download-assets
scripts.test:platforms: echo 'Run npm run android in one terminal and npm run ios in another'
